Pre-Game Insights: The Colorado Rockies lost their last game against the Milwaukee Brewers but won the series.
The Detroit Tigers won their last two games against the Oakland Athletics and took the series.
Casey Mize has given up a combined six earned runs in his last three starts.
Others: Tanner Gordon will start for the Colorado Rockies, with a 0-5 record and a 7.55 ERA in his first seven starts.
Keider Montero had a dazzling complete-game shutout with three hits, no walks, and five Ks for the Detroit Tigers in their last game.
The game will be played at Comerica Park.
